system.description:
At 18th level, your Divine Infusion no longer decreases the size of the dice converted from some other form of damage to radiant or necrotic.

In addition, if you are at least 30 feet above your target or the spellâ€™s damage source originates from above (such as in the case of flame strike, call lightning, or moonbeam) your spells deal an additional 1d8 of your choice of radiant or necrotic damage.
